QuestData.Title: Growing the Farm III: The Mossy Boulder
QuestData.Description: Now that we're officially members of the Tillers Union, Mr. Mudclaw said he'd be happy to help us upturn this big ole' rock in the middle of our field.$B$BOnce we clear away that stone, I've got something special planned.$B$BRun down and give him a holler to let him know that we're ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Haohan Mudclaw in The Heartland or at Halfhill Market in the Valley of the Four Winds.
